title: Gorgeous Home 🏡 Don't Miss Out!
posting_body: ['This new house is yours for just $2,509/month!*', "Don't miss out on this amazing deal!", 'Call today!', 'show contact info', 'ext.', "300 - We're open daily until 8pm", 'Home Features:', '~ 3 Bedrooms', '~ 2.5 Bathrooms', '~ Attached 2-Car Garage', '~ Fully Fenced Backyard', '~ New Carpet', '~ So Much Storage Space!', '~ Spacious Kitchen with Granite Countertops and Hardwood', '~ Lovely Master Suite with Attached Bathroom', '~ Walk-In Closets!', 'Give us a call to schedule your tour!', 'show contact info', 'ext.', '300', 'Phone calls are preferred.', 'If you are responding by email, please include your contact information.', '*P & I. Price $529,900, 5.875% Fixed/5.934% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.', 'Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.', 'Home pictured may display decorator items and furniture which are not available for purchase even upon additional payment.', 'Please consult an LGI Homes new home consultant and review a home sales contract for additional information and disclosures.']
